full_text: .@penguins please tell Sid that Robert Thomas has more assists than him and he should add him to his magic off-season workout group. He'll be a fellow multi-Cup winner by them, too.

To @wyshynski's point about Robert Thomas's generic name holding him back, I present the 4th google result I got upon searching his name (behind the tweets thing, nhl, and href) https://t.co/1VIRQGVt76
